segments.text: I was thinking of holding the company retreat in the mountains .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I agree , I think that that would be perfect !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was thinking it could take place sometime in January .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That might be a little too cold for some people .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about April ? April has good weather that isn't too cold or too hot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that would work out better .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know , maybe we could take a survey to see how that works for everyone .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good idea ! We'll have to get right on it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine ! Well , I'll get right on it now !
segments.speaker: S2
